price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߘߌ߫، ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߛߋ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
